theguardian.com/2015/04/high-court-rulin.title: High court ruling paves way for courts to decide whether bridge is a sport...
theguardian.com/2015/04/high-court-rulin.snippet: Bridge, the genteel and physically unchallenging card game played by millions, may exercise the brain muscle, but is it a sport? That is the question taxing legal minds as a high court ruling on Monday paved the way for a courtroom battle to decide.
